channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ICE is sending a chill through the construction industry
item.description: The construction industry, where more than a quarter of workers are foreign-born, has long struggled to find enough workers. Now, industry officials s...

item.title: The DOJ has been firing judges with immigrant defense backgrounds
item.description: NPR's data analysis shows that the DOJ has tended to fire judges with immigrant defense backgrounds in its recent rounds of dismissals.

item.title: The government shutdown is delaying an assistance program families use to heat homes
item.description: The Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program, or LIHEAP, helps about 6 million U.S. households pay energy bills, buy fuel, or fix broken heaters. The...

item.title: The federal government is still shut down. Here's what that means across the country

item.title: Cars in German city found smeared with swastikas in blood, police say
item.description: Cars, walls and postboxes have been defaced, in what appears to be human blood.

item.title: Officials scour charred site of Kentucky UPS plane crash for victims and answers
Israel says Hamas returned body of dead Tanzanian hostage
item.description: Joshua Mollel, a 21-year-old agriculture student, was killed at Kibbutz Nir Oz during the Hamas-led 7 October 2023 attack on Israel.

item.title: South Africans trapped in Donbas after joining Russia-Ukraine war, Ramaphosa says
item.description: It is unclear whether the citizens were fighting on behalf of Russia or Ukraine.

item.title: Pirates fire grenades and board vessel off Somali coast

item.title: The remains and stories of Native American students are being reclaimed from a Pennsylvania cemetery

item.description: British police say two people killed in synagogue attack in Manchester; ADP shows private payrolls fell by 32,000 in September.

item.title: Miss Universe contestants stage walkout after organiser berates Miss Mexico
item.description: Miss Mexico, Fatima Bosch, said Nawat Itsaragrisil was 'not respectful' at a pre-pageant ceremony on Tuesday
